alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 12 at 3:58AM PST until January 13 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow is no longer expected. Therefore the Winter Storm Warning has been cancelled. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley and Wallowa County. * WHEN...From this afternoon through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
